title: PUBG
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.

title: Genshin Impact
description: An open-world action RPG that takes place in the fantasy world of Teyvat, where players can explore a massive world and engage in elemental combat.

title: Call of Duty Mobile
description: Experience the legendary Call of Duty action with classic multiplayer maps and modes, plus a 100-player Battle Royale.

title: Fortnite
description: The ultimate build-and-battle experience where you can drop onto a massive island and compete to be the last one standing.

title: Minecraft
description: A game where players can explore blocky, procedurally generated 3D worlds and discover and extract raw materials, craft tools and items, and build structures.

title: League of Legends: Wild Rift
description: A 5v5 MOBA designed for mobile, bringing the strategic depth of League of Legends to a new platform.

title: Clash of Clans
description: Build your village, train your troops and go to battle against millions of other players online.

title: Roblox
description: An online platform where users can program games and play games created by other users.

title: Free Fire
description: A survival shooter game where 50 players parachute onto a remote island, seeking to be the last one standing.

title: Candy Crush Saga
description: Switch and match Candies in this divine puzzle adventure to progress to the next level.

title: Among Us
description: A social deduction game where crewmates work together to complete tasks, but must beware of the Impostors among them.

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents.

title: Asphalt 9: Legends
description: Drive the world's best hypercars and experience the thrill of arcade racing in spectacular locations.

title: Pokemon GO
description: Explore the real world and discover Pokémon wherever you are in this AR adventure game.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game set in the fictional state of San Andreas, featuring a massive map and both single-player and online components.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Play as monster slayer Geralt of Rivia in a dark fantasy open world, tracking down a child of prophecy in this acclaimed RPG.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: The next era of the classic team-based tactical shooter, built on the Source 2 engine with upgraded features and competitive play.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A story-rich, party-based RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, featuring deep tactical combat and player choice.

title: League of Legends
description: A fast-paced, competitive, online battle arena where two teams of five powerful champions clash to destroy the enemy's base.

title: StarCraft II
description: Command three unique and powerful races in an epic sci-fi strategy game featuring vast campaigns and competitive multiplayer.

title: Valorant
description: A 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities in competitive matches.

title: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play hero shooter where legendary competitors battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

title: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based action game where heroes do battle in a world of conflict with unique abilities and playstyles.

title: Dota 2
description: A multiplayer online battle arena where two teams of five players compete to destroy the opposing team's Ancient.

title: Rocket League
description: A high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls.

title: Elden Ring
description: A fantasy action-RPG adventure set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R.R. Martin.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland, featuring a vast and atmospheric world.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

title: God of War
description: Kratos and his son Atreus embark on a journey through Norse mythology in this epic action-adventure.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Experience Aloy's legendary quest to unravel the mysteries of a future Earth ruled by Machines.

title: Spider-Man Remastered
description: Swing through Marvel's New York as the iconic Spider-Man in this action-packed adventure.

title: The Last of Us Part I
description: Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters in this rebuilt version of the acclaimed game.

title: Destiny 2
description: A free-to-play online-only multiplayer first-person shooter where Guardians defend the last safe city on Earth.

title: Warframe
description: A free-to-play action game where players control members of the Tenno, a race of ancient warriors.

title: Halo Infinite
description: Master Chief returns in the most expansive Halo campaign yet with a stunning sci-fi epic.

title: FIFA 23
description: Experience the world's game with HyperMotion2 Technology, men's and women's FIFA World Cup, and more.

title: NBA 2K23
description: Answer the call and make your mark in the city with the latest basketball simulation game.

title: Madden NFL 23
description: Hit the field and own the competition with all-new ways to control your impact.

title: Stardew Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Armed with hand-me-down tools, you set out to begin your new life.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, build! The very world is at your fingertips in this action-packed adventure game.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Descend into the world of Hollow Knight! A 2D action-adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes.

title: Dead Cells
description: A roguelike, metroidvania inspired action-platformer where you'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

title: Celeste
description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain in this tight platformer.

title: Cuphead
description: A classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles, inspired by 1930s cartoons.

title: Undertale
description: A unique RPG where you don't have to destroy anyone. Each enemy can be defeated nonviolently.

title: Fall Guys
description: A massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players online in a free-for-all struggle.

title: Sea of Thieves
description: A shared-world adventure game where crews of pirates seek fortune and glory upon the high seas.

title: No Man's Sky
description: Explore infinite worlds and embark on an epic voyage to the center of a shared universe.

title: Subnautica
description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril.

title: Rust
description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island's wildlife and other inhabitants.

title: ARK: Survival Evolved
description: Stranded on a mysterious prehistoric island, you must explore its vast biomes and hunt, harvest, craft.

title: The Forest
description: As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive.

title: 7 Days to Die
description: An open-world game that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and RPG.

title: Valheim
description: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by viking culture.

title: Satisfactory
description: A first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat.

title: Factorio
description: Build and maintain factories, mine resources, research technologies, and fight enemies.

title: Cities: Skylines
description: A modern take on the classic city simulation with new gameplay elements and expanded city building experience.

title: Planet Zoo
description: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic animals.

title: Planet Coaster
description: Surprise, delight and thrill crowds as you build the theme park of your dreams.

title: Two Point Hospital
description: Design stunning hospitals, cure peculiar illnesses and manage troublesome staff as you spread your budding healthcare organization.

title: Slay the Spire
description: A fusion of card games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, and discover relics.

title: Darkest Dungeon
description: A challenging gothic roguelike turn-based RPG about the psychological stresses of adventuring.

title: Risk of Rain 2
description: Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters with your friends.

title: Enter the Gungeon
description: A bullet hell dungeon crawler following a band of misfits seeking to shoot, loot, dodge roll and table-flip.

title: Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: A randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy roguelike elements following Isaac on his journey.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
description: The eagerly anticipated sequel to the award-winning RPG. Gather your party. Master deep, tactical combat.

title: Pillars of Eternity II
description: Pursue a rogue god over land and sea in the sequel to the multi-award-winning RPG Pillars of Eternity.

title: Disco Elysium
description: A groundbreaking open world role playing game. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

title: Persona 5 Royal
description: Don the mask of Joker and join the Phantom Thieves of Hearts in this definitive version of Persona 5.

title: Final Fantasy XIV
description: Take part in an epic and ever-changing FINAL FANTASY as you adventure and explore with friends.

title: World of Warcraft
description: Join millions of players and embark on epic quests in the world of Azeroth.

title: Elder Scrolls Online
description: Experience the award-winning online RPG set in the beloved Elder Scrolls universe.

title: Guild Wars 2
description: Create your own legend in a living, breathing world where your choices matter.

title: Black Desert Online
description: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends.

title: Lost Ark
description: Embark on an odyssey for the Lost Ark in a vast, vibrant world with action combat and endless depth.

title: Monster Hunter: World
description: Welcome to a new world! Take on the role of a hunter and slay ferocious monsters in a living, breathing ecosystem.

title: Dark Souls III
description: As fires fade and the world falls into ruin, journey into a universe filled with more colossal enemies.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Carve your own clever path to vengeance in this evolution of the Dark Souls series.

title: Bloodborne
description: Face your fears as you search for answers in the ancient city of Yharnam, now cursed with a strange endemic illness.

title: Nioh 2
description: Master the lethal arts of the samurai as a mysterious half-human, half-supernatural Yokai warrior.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Forge a new path and wage an unconventional war for the freedom of Tsushima in this open-world action adventure.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Become Eivor, a Viking raider raised to be a fearless warrior, and lead your clan from icy Norway to England.

title: Far Cry 6
description: Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. Fight to liberate the nation from dictator Antón Castillo.

title: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: Build a resistance from virtually anyone you see as you hack, infiltrate, and fight to take back a near-future London.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Master the art of destruction and gadgetry in this intense, tactical shooter.

title: Battlefield 2042
description: Enter the near-future battlegrounds of Battlefield 2042 with massive-scale warfare.

title: Titanfall 2
description: Respawn Entertainment gives you the most advanced titan technology in its new, single player campaign.

title: Payday 2
description: A four-player co-op shooter that has you sporting the masks of the original crew as they hit Washington D.C.

title: Left 4 Dead 2
description: Set in the zombie apocalypse, this co-op action horror FPS takes you through cities, swamps and cemeteries.

title: Back 4 Blood
description: A thrilling cooperative first-person shooter from the creators of the critically acclaimed Left 4 Dead franchise.

title: Deep Rock Galactic
description: A 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Experience survival horror like never before in the eighth major installment in the Resident Evil franchise.

title: Outlast
description: A true survival horror experience which aims to show that the most terrifying monsters of all come from the human mind.

title: Alien: Isolation
description: Discover the true meaning of fear in Alien: Isolation, a survival horror set in an atmosphere of constant dread.

title: Phasmophobia
description: A 4 player online co-op psychological horror where you and your team investigate paranormal activity.

title: Dead by Daylight
description: A multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer and the others play as Survivors.

title: It Takes Two
description: Embark on the craziest journey of your life in this genre-bending platform adventure built purely for co-op.

title: A Way Out
description: A Way Out is an exclusively co-op adventure where you play the role of one of two prisoners making their escape.

title: Portal 2
description: The sequel to the title named 'Game of the Year' 2007, Portal 2 is a hilariously mind-bending adventure.
